title: Add "Open in Browser" to the context menu
Refactor name check and title update so works with custom prompt
Move cursor to clicked position (as near as possible)
Continous saving of current tabs and tab-zooms
Restore zoom level from saved state
Replace Granite.DynamicNotebook with Hdy TabView and TabBar
Check for equivalent existing tab when opening with working directory.
Unsafe Pastes: Handle multi-line pastes as well
MainWindow: Use the XTerm title if defined
Use escape sequence and ignore clicks on command prompt
Fix inoperative header decorations when fullscreened
Do not process keystrokes when there is a foreground process.
Use palette colors for default bg/fg
Pressing the menu keyboard button opens right-click menu
Pick a larger window size for first run.
MainWindow: Apply font changes on the fly
Get pwd from ApplicationCommandLine if possible when no -w flag given
Add shortcut for reload tab action
Do not pass Esc characters to terminal.
MainWindow: Move Actions and Keyboard Handling Related to The View to TerminalWidget
Gtk4 prep - Move zoom actions to MainWindow
Ctrl+tab key bind: go to previous tab
Show zoom level in centre or terminal when changing.
Rework control shift press handling - Gtk4 prep
Fix #88 & #94 - Disconnect signals when tab closed; reconnect on restoring
Do not restore tabs when opened with commandline -w parameter
Use Solarized Dark for dark UI
Only open `with_directory` mode when -w arg is not null
TerminalWidget: Port Context Menu to GLib.MenuModel and Gtk.PopoverMenu
SettingsPopover: use provider_for_screen for theme buttons
Fix #98 - Pass F keys to TerminalWidget first.
Don't restore tabs in a new window
Rewrite Unsafe Paste Dialog as Gtk.Dialog
-n option to open a new window instead of a new tab
MainWindow: Use the Gtk.EventControllerKey controller to handle the key events
Expose audible-bell setting in Settings Menu
Allow not ensuring tab existence for new window with coord
Grab focus to terminal widget when restoring
Use GLib.Action in place of deprecated Gtk.Action
Add 5 new themes and 3 text palette
Ignore hyperlink clicks just after focus in event.
-n option to open a new window instead of a new tab
Validate colors restored from settings; correct and replace as required.
